text: Polylepis multijuga is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to montane forests in the Peruvian Northern Andes, between 2700 and 3600 meters above sea level. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== multijuga Category:Endemic flora of Peru Category:Flora of the Andes Category:Páramo flora Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Trees of Peru Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Polylepis multijuga
